metadata.name: Clerus.
metadata.description:
Portraits of an ever-revolving future.
A poem inspired by transhumanism, daily life futurism and fractal identity.

Animation, AI and Post-Production.
Original Audio.

Visuals: Giancarlo Orsi
Audio: Santonas @santonas IG
Duration: 1:00 minute (Loopable).
Resolution: 800x800 px
Full Specs Resolution: 2048x2048 px 
Format: .Mp4

Unique edition 1/1

The owner will receive the Mp4 with full spec encoding. This is the purchase benefit only for the primary sale.
